description: Reversion to single house, erection of a single storey rear infill extension and rear outrigger roof extension, and alterations to existing front and rear roof including removal of front dormer.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Planning Statement (excluding sections referring to the front dormer) and Location Plan [received 25/11/2019], Flood Risk Assessment [received 23/01/2020], Amendment Letter [received 18/03/2020] and Drawings 577|1, 577|2, 577|3(A) and 577|4(A) [received 20/03/2020]) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise specified on the approved plans/elevations/supporting information.

Condition : 4 - Prior to first occupation of the development hereby approved, the waste and recycled materials storage arrangements shall be provided in line with the Council's Recycling and Refuse guidance.

Condition : 5 - Prior to first occupation of the development hereby approved, a secure and covered cycle parking facilities (for not less than two bicycles) for the occupants of the development shall be provided conforming current London Plan standards and the West London Cycle Parking Guidance in design and layout and thereafter retained for use at all times without obstruction.
